page.title: 17TRANSPORT LANDSCAPE
page.content: The Ecology group spent the whole morning walking along the single track roads with occasional passing places. Some of the roads were being resurfaced that day,and this meant closing them for a short time,to all traffic,including pedestrians.During the morning,all traffic was of light Industrial/Agricultural type,except for a few private cars.However while walking the A3058,the traffic was so heavy as to be impossible to count, and nearly all were private cars.Other transport features included the railway with two very impressive viaducts,up to 8 arches and 100 feet high.We noted only two isolated postboxes.The group noted 5 trains, 4 of which were from the clay industry.
